code: import*as actionTypes from'../actions/actionTypes';import{updateObject}from'../utility';var initialState={users:[],loading:false};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.GET_ALL_USERS:return updateObject(state,{users:action.data});default:return state;}};export default reducer;
